name: Farmer's Friend
description: A simple application that focuses on providing an efficient and easy platform for farmers. It allows them to gain knowledge on suitable crops for their location.

name: Fitness Diaries
description: Fitness Diaries is a full-stack web application that uses MVC design pattern with local server-side API. It is designed for people who would like to follow a fitness regime or lose weight with a socializing aspect attached.
